properties.areaDesc: Jefferson; Central and Southern Lewis and Clark
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 5 at 3:47AM MST until February 7 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches
at lower elevations, except 8 to 15 inches at higher elevations.
Winds gusting as high as 40 mph.

* WHERE...Central and Southern Lewis and Clark and Jefferson.

* WHEN...From 5 AM Thursday to 5 AM MST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of
blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM THURSDAY TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY
